message: Hi Bob, I'm proposing a 60-40 split in my favor. This gives you a solid $40 while being fair to both of us. Keep in mind that if we go to another round, inflation will reduce the value by 20% for me, making the total worth only $80 to me.

Alice, I understand your previous proposal, but considering the inflation affecting me, I think a 55-45 split in my favor is more reasonable. This way, we both get a fair share while accounting for the decreasing value of the money for me.
